CustomField.description: Date of the last (partial soft-credit) gift made by this Account. See "Combined Last Gift Date" for date of last gift overall (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date of the last (partial soft-credit) gift made by this Account. See "Combined Last Gift Date" for date of last gift overall (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.label: Last Partial Soft Credit Gift Date
